2025-02-18T09:39:46.771706: interviewee response: As a full-stack developer at BinyClub, I have to build a web platform and mobile application. So one platform I built was a system to manage users' data and upload data, store data, retrieve them and display them on the frontend. One challenging problem there is handling the large data, but I resolved that using some Google DB tools which helps to easily fetch data, index data and organize them in an easy way to handle.
